===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[touch]]; to [[feel]] {{qualifier|with the hand}}; to [[caress]]
#* {{zh-x|這 紙 摸 起來 很 粗糙。|This paper '''feels''' rough.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 '''摸''' 了 '''摸''' 男孩 的 額頭，燒 得 燙 手。|He '''touched''' the boy's forehead. It was burning hot.}}
# to [[fish]] for; to [[fumble]]; to [[grope]] for
#* {{zh-x|他 把手 伸 進 上衣 口袋 裡 '''摸''' 鑰匙。|He '''dug into''' his coat pocket for his keys.}}
#* {{zh-x|他 在 黑暗 中 到處 瞎 '''摸''' 找 另一 隻 襪子。|He '''groped''' around in the dark for his other sock.}}
# to [[feel out]]; to [[sound out]]
#* {{zh-x|我 簡直 '''摸''' 不 透 他。|I just can't '''figure him out'''.}}
# {{lb|zh|Sichuan}} to [[dally]]
